title: Father's Day First Drafts with Evie Colbert
description:
The fabulous Evie Colbert returns for a very special Father’s Day edition of everyone’s favorite late night greeting card segment, First Drafts. Happy Father's Day from The Late Show Pod Show!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
